roleset.name: move through water
roleset.note: SWIM-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls run-51.3.2, swarm-47.5.1-1. (from swim.01-v)
SWIM-N NOTES: Based on verb entry swim.01, Differs from verb frame because this frame conflated location/direction/destination. Corresponds to Vncls run-51.3.2, swarm-47.5.1-1. (from swim.01-n)

roles.note: Use ArgMs for location,and extent/distance swam. Be careful to distinguish "course" argument from location arguments: swimming the English Channel (course) is different from swimming IN the English Channel (location). (from swim.01-n)

example.name: metaphorical transitive
example.text: Pictures of rusted oil drums swim into focus, and the female voice purrs, ``That hazardous waste on his (Mr. Courter's) property -- the neighbors are suing for consumer fraud.''

example.name: commonly intransitive
example.text: ``People say they swim, and that may mean they've been to the beach this year,'' says Krys Spain, research specialist for the President's Council on Physical Fitness and Sports.

example.name: literal with course
example.text: Not content to merely cross the English Channel, John swam across the Atlantic Ocean this summer.

example.name: loc as subject usage
example.text: The river swam with fish, so many you could almost walk from bank to bank and never touch the water.
example.arg: so many you could almost walk from bank to bank and never touch the water

example.name: Arg 0 only, within LVC
example.text: Muskrats , according to my encyclopedia , look like giant rats , are found in and around the mudbanks bordering marshes and quiet ponds , have partially webbed feet , and do a good deal of swimming .

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: Strel completed his swim of the entire 5265-kilometer (3272-mile) Amazon River on Saturday.

example.name: Args 2 & 3
example.text: Our objective is to have everyone successfully complete the swim from Alcatraz to San Francisco.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: He considers his swimming the English Channel as his version of a grassroots campaign.

roleset.name: feel dizzy
roleset.note: SWIM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'swim' based on sentences in wsj. (from swim.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: oh, oh, the pain
example.text: John's head was swimming from the amount of coffee he'd drunk that morning.
example.arg: from the amount of coffee he'd drunk that morning
